::Bluestreak, Ratchet, Sideswipe, and Depth Charge spot Savage attacking the 
ark::
Sideswipe: When will they learn that if the ark goes, were all dead?
Depth Charge: Screw that! We'll take him out easily!
::Depth Charge fires 2 disks, Sideswipe fires 10 shots from his rifle, 
Bluestreak throws 2 daggers, and Ratchet shots 4 armor piercing rounds from 
his blaster::
